Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Houston in 1965...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1966, off Jim Lonborg (CHC)...
Earned first career win on 4/2/1966...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Cincinnati on 4/15/1966, striking out 12...
Struck out 15 batters against Philadelphia on 6/5/1966...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Chicago (N) on 9/28/1966, striking out 9...
Struck out 15 batters against St. Louis on 7/24/1967...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1968, off Tug McGraw (CHC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1969, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1969, going 3-2, 0.85...
Struck out 15 batters against Chicago (N) on 9/29/1969...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Pittsburgh on 4/5/1970, striking out 12...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1970, going 6-1, 1.83...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 10/4/1970...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1971, going 6-1, 1.00...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1971, going 6-0, 0.87...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1971, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Cy Young Award in 1971, going 31-6, 1.68 ERA...
Injured on 5/21/1972 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1972, going 2-1, 0.76...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 7/19/1972...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1972, going 4-2, 0.94...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1973, going 6-1, 1.50...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Struck out 16 batters against Pittsburgh on 9/19/1973...
Injured on 6/21/1975 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for entire career...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1977, winning 2 games with a 1.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1977, going 6-2, 1.46...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1977, winning 2 games with a 1.42 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1977, winning 2 games with a 2.70 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1978, going 6-0, 1.49...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1978, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 2/10/1981 (Going to HOU: C O. Virgil Jr., P D. Daboll, P G. Heimueller, P J. Price. Going to CIN: C S. Chilcott, P N. Ryan, P S. McDowell)...
